com.xtructure.xneat.genetics.impl
Class NEATGeneticsFactoryImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.xtructure.xevolution.evolution.impl.AbstractEvolutionObject
      com.xtructure.xevolution.genetics.impl.AbstractGeneticsFactory<D>
          com.xtructure.xneat.genetics.impl.AbstractNEATGeneticsFactory<GeneMap>
              com.xtructure.xneat.genetics.impl.NEATGeneticsFactoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
EvolutionObject, GeneticsFactory<GeneMap>, NEATGeneticsFactory<GeneMap>
public class NEATGeneticsFactoryImpl
extends AbstractNEATGeneticsFactory<GeneMap>

NEATGeneticsFactoryImpl is an implementation of the NEATGeneticsFactory interface. It's a factory for NEATGenomes with data payloads of type GeneMap, consisting of LinkGeneImpl and NodeGeneImpl genes.

Author:
Luis Guimbarda
